text: The Supreme Court has "explained that the phrase ‘case of actual controversy' in the [DJA] refers to the [same] type of ‘Cases' and ‘Controversies' that are justiciable under Article III."

text: If the employee establishes a prima facie retaliation claim, "the burden shifts to the employer to state a legitimate, non-retaliatory reason for its decision."

text: Under both Pennsylvania and New Jersey law, our role in interpreting an insurance policy is to "ascertain the intent of the parties as manifested by the language of the written instrument."
